mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Worktype(emp_idx, work_date, worktype, start_time) VALUES(#{emp_idx}, #{work_date}, #{worktype}, #{start_time})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Worktype WHERE emp_idx = #{emp_idx} AND work_date = CURDATE()

SELECT w.*, u.emp_name FROM Worktype w JOIN employee e ON w.emp_idx = e.emp_idx JOIN users u ON e.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE w.emp_idx = #{emp_idx} AND w.work_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
